Ende:
The blood of the monsters of the tower of impudence is necessary to me! It seems, before their blood some secret is hidden. All come here in order to obtain this blood. The recently appeared monsters especially me interest.
Destroy the soldiers of Vladimir, soldiers Of [radzhuosa], Ken [Birestian], [Bistiana], [Birestiana], Soldier- keeper of rainbow, Knight- keeper of rainbow and bring to me 10 models of the blood of faithfulness.
It would be healthily, if b you at the same time destroyed their leaders: Vladimir, [Radzhuos], Ken they would bring to me the blood of truth!
